title: Sooo take a look at this crap.
body:
Hello first time doing this, and i don't know what discussion to put this under, little bit mad at the moment.

 So a couple or a few months back i got a mythic skin shard annie and i was like "NO WAY!!!" and i really do like annie at the moment so i have been trying to get chests and keys by playing games on multiple different champions so like i have only been playing soraka morgana janna and mao the only 3 i have at this moment, so i played about like i don't know 30-50 games (not exaggerating) trying to get at least an S- and failed to do so and these last few games i finally got the S-'s and i was really happy like "oh my god finally! i'm so happy!" got the chests unlocked them got skin shards oh yay me now little did i know when i disenchanted them and got the orange essences that i only needed 3 orange essences and about at this moment i'm in between to where i wanna just shoot myself in the foot or break something both i'm really trying not to do but i can't but i cannot make any promises not to. So if anyone that is in a very bad mood at this moment please take a look at this, PLEASE CHEER UP! DON'T BE IN A BAD MOOD PLEASE!! IT SUCKS SO MUCH!!!

 Update: I just got a goddamn champion shard from since the day i posted this trying to get chest and key shards so i'm done trying to get it i'm renting it out.

replies.body:
Oh my gosh, you're so close to Hextech Annie! 

It pains me to say that I *cannot* grant you orange essence, but I'm confident that with more dedication and hard work, you'll get another chest + key so you can nab the essence you need to unlock her skin.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please let me know.

Yes, since i don't have any chests or key shards or have any champions that i can get an S on at this moment will the grades go back to new next season/year?

 And thank you for your concern.
Your eligibility to earn chests on champs you had earned them on in season 6 will be reset for this next season, yes.

>
> Your eligibility to earn chests on champs you had earned them on in season 6 will be reset for this next season, yes.

When will the season 7 Start?
According to [this page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017) the target date is *December 7th*. Hope that helps!
Its not like you lose the essence, it will come in useful next time you want to upgrade a shard. Still quite a bummer though.
You are right but what are the chances of the next chest will be a champion shard? if i need 3 orange essences then that means my luck is very very poor at the moment and its very frustrating.

Honestly I don't know what the chances are, however it seems like at least 75% of mine have been skin shards.  I've been unlucky the last two chests I got champion shards, but I hadn't gotten any for a while. I gotta get in my last chests before they get reset, it should reset at the beginning of the season I think.
You could just buy a chest and key for about a dollar.
